description: Use Polaris as Iceberg Rest Catalog.
on_init: create secret polaris_secret (TYPE ICEBERG, CLIENT_ID getenv('POLARIS_CLIENT_ID'),CLIENT_SECRET getenv('POLARIS_CLIENT_SECRET'),ENDPOINT 'http://0.0.0.0:8181/api/catalog'); attach 'quickstart_catalog' as my_datalake (type ICEBERG,ENDPOINT 'http://0.0.0.0:8181/api/catalog');
